content.body: Domenic: what defines that `:root, :--blah { background:lime }` suddenly works if not a change to Selectors?

content.body: annevk: My understanding is any time anyone <dfn>s a pseudo-class, it now works. There's no master list of pseudo-classes; even Selectors is just a bunch of <dfn>s.
content.formatted_body: annevk: My understanding is any time anyone <dfn>s a pseudo-class, it now works. There's no master list of pseudo-classes; even Selectors is just a bunch of <dfn>s.

content.body: The Steering Group is considering making a change with regards to which changes require signing the Participant Agreement. In particular allowing "trivial changes" to go through. https://github.com/whatwg/sg/issues/63#issuecomment-1377827797 has a draft definition. (Probably best to engage here first if you have any feedback as that issue thread is already pretty long.)

content.body: Can you throw DOMExceptions from in parallel? I didn't think so, since I thought they had to be constructed on the "main thread", but now I[m not sure
